dialogues.text: Hello, traveler. What can I do for you?
Absolutely. I hope to see you back another time!
Do come in! Please, don't touch any of the items on display.
This is a museum built in honor of Stozar, one of the last Giants of the Midlands.
Centuries ago, the Giants aided the people of the Midlands in building impressive dams or fortresses in the mountains.
At the end of the First Age, mankind started using the Giants in warfare. This led to a severe decline of the population.
Only a few Giants remained. One of them was Stozar. The people of our tribe, south of here, were strongly opposed to using Giants for warfare.
Stozar was grateful for this and remained by our side, while the other Giants deserted mankind and sadly went extinct in solitude...
The statue outside this museum pays homage to the loyalty and friendship between Giants and humankind and this museum was established to make sure history will not repeat itself.
